Title: How the megabill will limit health care access. And, plans to ease gun regulations
Description:
The House is set to vote on the GOP megabill today.
It is set to make big changes that will limit health care access to Americans.
And, the ATF plans to ease gun regulations.

Title: Apple is making a cheap MacBook — that's bad news for Windows
Description:
